verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Also, <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> unto the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> An <S%H7093>end,<s%> the <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>corners<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> is the <S%H7093>end<s%> come <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> mine <S%H639>anger<s%> upon thee, and will <S%H8199>judge<s%> thee according to thy <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

And mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2347>spare<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee, <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I have <S%H2550>pity:<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> I will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> thy <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee: and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> An <S%H7451>evil,<s%> an <S%H259>only<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> is <S%H935>come.<s%>
An <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H935>come:<s%> it <S%H6974>watcheth<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> thee; <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is <S%H935>come.<s%>

The <S%H6843>morning<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, O thou that <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> in the <S%H776>land:<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> is <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4103>trouble<s%> is <S%H7138>near,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> the sounding <S%H1906>again<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> will I <S%H4480>shortly<s%> <S%H7138><s%> pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> mine <S%H639>anger<s%> upon thee: and I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> thee according to thy <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee <S%H853>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

And mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2347>spare,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I have <S%H2550>pity:<s%> I will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee according to thy <S%H1870>ways<s%> and thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that <S%H1961>are<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee; and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H5221>smiteth.<s%>

Behold <S%H2009><s%> the <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is <S%H935>come:<s%> the <S%H6843>morning<s%> is gone <S%H3318>forth;<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> hath <S%H6692>blossomed,<s%> <S%H2087>pride<s%> hath <S%H6524>budded.<s%>

Violence <S%H2555><s%> is risen <S%H6965>up<s%> into a <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness:<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them shall remain, <S%H3808>nor<s%> of their <S%H4480>multitude,<s%> <S%H1995><s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> of any of <S%H4480>theirs:<s%> <S%H1991><s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall there be <S%H5089>wailing<s%> for them.

The <S%H6256>time<s%> is <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> draweth <S%H5060>near:<s%> let <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H7069>buyer<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> the <S%H4376>seller<s%> <S%H56>mourn:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H2740>wrath<s%> is <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> thereof.

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H4376>seller<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> that which is <S%H4465>sold,<s%> although they were <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive:<s%> <S%H2416><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H2377>vision<s%> is <S%H413>touching<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1995>multitude<s%> thereof, which shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>return;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H376>any<s%> strengthen <S%H2388>himself<s%> in the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of his <S%H2416>life.<s%>

They have <S%H8628>blown<s%> the <S%H8619>trumpet,<s%> even to make all <S%H3559>ready;<s%> <S%H3605><s%> but <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H1980>goeth<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> my <S%H2740>wrath<s%> is <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> thereof.

The <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H2351>without,<s%> and the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> and the <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H4480>within:<s%> <S%H1004><s%> he <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and he <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%> and <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> him.

But they that <S%H6403>escape<s%> of them shall <S%H6412>escape,<s%> and shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> like <S%H3123>doves<s%> of the <S%H1516>valleys,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H1993>mourning,<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> for his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be <S%H7503>feeble,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1290>knees<s%> shall be <S%H1980>weak<s%> as <S%H4325>water.<s%>

They shall also <S%H2296>gird<s%> themselves with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H6427>horror<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> them; and <S%H955>shame<s%> shall be <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6440>faces,<s%> and <S%H7144>baldness<s%> upon <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>

They shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> their <S%H3701>silver<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets,<s%> and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5079>removed:<s%> their <S%H3701>silver<s%> and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H5678>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> their <S%H5315>souls,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H4578>bowels:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it <S%H1961>is<s%> the <S%H4383>stumblingblock<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

As for the <S%H6643>beauty<s%> of his <S%H5716>ornament,<s%> he <S%H7760>set<s%> it in <S%H1347>majesty:<s%> but they <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6754>images<s%> of their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> and of their detestable <S%H8251>things<s%> therein: <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> have I <S%H5414>set<s%> it <S%H5079>far<s%> from them.

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H2114>strangers<s%> for a <S%H957>prey,<s%> and to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for a <S%H7998>spoil;<s%> and they shall <S%H2490>pollute<s%> it.

My <S%H6440>face<s%> will I <S%H5437>turn<s%> also <S%H4480>from<s%> them, and they shall <S%H2490>pollute<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6845>secret<s%> place: for the <S%H6530>robbers<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into it, and <S%H2490>defile<s%> it.

Make <S%H6213><s%> a <S%H7569>chain:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H4941>crimes,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2555>violence.<s%>

Wherefore I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H7451>worst<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1004>houses:<s%> I will also make the <S%H1347>pomp<s%> of the <S%H5794>strong<s%> to <S%H7673>cease;<s%> and their holy <S%H4720>places<s%> shall be <S%H2490>defiled.<s%>
Destruction <S%H7089><s%> <S%H935>cometh;<s%> and they shall <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and there shall be <S%H369>none.<s%>

Mischief <S%H1943><s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H1943>mischief,<s%> and <S%H8052>rumor<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H8052>rumor;<s%> then shall they <S%H1245>seek<s%> a <S%H2377>vision<s%> of the <S%H4480>prophet;<s%> <S%H5030><s%> but the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H4480>priest,<s%> <S%H3548><s%> and <S%H6098>counsel<s%> from the <S%H4480>ancients.<s%> <S%H2205><s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H56>mourn,<s%> and the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> and the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H926>troubled:<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them after their <S%H4480>way,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> and according to their <S%H4941>deserts<s%> will I <S%H8199>judge<s%> them; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
